title: From Clegg to Cameron: Why Westminster's outcasts have found a second home in Silicon Valley
text:
Where do former mandarins go once Westminster has lost its shine? The private sector has always held temptations for former civil servants and policy advisers, who head to consultancies and intelligence firms to enjoy higher salaries and more freedom away from the strictures of government.

But nowadays there’s an even bigger prize - Silicon Valley. A succession of top Westminster policy figures have been drawn into the California tech scene, taking on roles at Google, Facebook, Uber and Netflix, and helping those companies navigate the growing regulatory scrutiny they face both in the US and abroad.

This challenge has lured former deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg to Facebook and Rachel Whetstone,...
description: Where do former mandarins go once Westminster has lost its shine?
